title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Early Warning System,"  Reverse Side", ca. 1987
medium: Brush and blue gouche, red and blue felt-tipped marking pen on heavy white tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black marking pen, lower right:  "Early Warning System"/Reverse side; at lower left:  3.2 [encircled]
description: A three panel screen on wheels with large black square at right, intersected by a black triangle at left.  A target in red and white is above central panel; a red zig-zag halo and light on blue pole with electrical cord coming out bottom of pole, is above right panel; partial lightning bolt at right edge of right panel.
